description: Naturalized - without human impacts on river flow.
Constant human impacts - present-day (year-2000) dams and water use.
Time-varying human impacts - time-varying historical dam construction and water use.
Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.
Constant pre-industrial (1860) land use, nitrogen deposition, and fertilizer input.
Varying historical land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.
Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6.
Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0.
Land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input fixed at year 2100 levels according to RCP2.6 in 2100.
